Class FourNode

java.lang.Object

ai.nettogrof.battlesnake.treesearch.search.standard.AbstractStandardNode
ai.nettogrof.battlesnake.treesearch.search.standard.FourNode
public class FourNode
extends AbstractStandardNode
This FourNode class must be use when only 3 or 4 snakes left, and in standard mode.
Version:
Spring 2021
Author:
carl.lajeunesse
